name: OneMoon
description: OneMoon is a deflationary "static/reflective rewards". DAO community. It is inspired by passive reward mechanics. The OneMoon DAO was established resource which is ever-growing from allocations during the burning process. 5% goes to existing holders of OneMoon as rewards. As a OneMoon holders earn passive income by just holding OneMoon with 5% yields during the burning process. This builds up over time from buying, selling and transferring. One of the key attributes with OneMoon is the locked liquidity. This allows the community to have insurance that there will always be an ever growing liquidity.
